title: Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users – Becomes World's Most Used AI Assistant
shortdescription: Alexa's new multimodal AI powers smart homes, cars, and offices as Amazon stock jumps 12%.
description: Alexa reaches 1B monthly active users — surpasses Siri, Google Assistant, and Copilot combined as Amazon stock surges 12%.

title: Julio Herrera Velutini, The Paterfamilias of the House of Herrera: Shaping Nations Through Finance
shortdescription: How one man leverages centuries-old traditions, gold-backed fortunes, and a steadfast vision to influence domestic and international policies for economic progress.
description: As the patriarch of the legendary Herrera-Velutini banking dynasty, Julio Herrera Velutini continues a 600-year legacy of financial mastery, using gold reserves and strategic investments to drive economic policy across Latin America and beyond.
image: /images/Julio Herrera Velutini, The Paterfamilias of the House of Herrera.webp
author: Gwen John

title: Santander Acquires Webster Financial for $12.3 Billion to Strengthen U.S. Market Position
shortdescription: Banco Santander has agreed to pay $12.3 billion to acquire Webster Financial, a strategic move to bolster its presence in the U.S. market.
description: The $12.3 billion acquisition will make Santander the largest bank in Connecticut by deposit share, overtaking Bank of America.
author: Gwen John

title: Treasury Liquidity Drain: $150 Billion in Settlements Could Pressure Stocks and Crypto
shortdescription: Up to $150B in Treasury settlements may drain market liquidity, raising risks for stocks, crypto, and global markets as dollar funding and yen volatility rise.
description: Liquidity tightening ahead: Treasury supply spike puts markets on watch as $150 billion in settlements could pressure stocks, crypto, and global risk assets.
author: Gwen John
